availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Heavenhill Lynn (Hopkins County, Kentucky, farm laborer and student)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farm laborer and student. Kentucky native. Son of William R. Lynn and Elizabeth Lynn. Married to Mary P. Lynn. Resident in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farm laborer and student in Hopkins County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 2, p. 159A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 703.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, Nebo, p. 64A.
